titleStmt.title: A Full account of the tryal of Godfrey Cross for high treason in adhering to the King and Queen's enemies by giving intelligence to the French fleet : as also in endeavouring to depose them of their royal crown and dignity by raising rebellion and discord amongst Their Majesties liege subjects &c. : at the King's Bench Bar at Westminster on Friday the 21st day of November, annoque Dom. 1690.

A Full account of the tryal of Godfrey Cross for high treason in adhering to the King and Queen's enemies by giving intelligence to the French fleet : as also in endeavouring to depose them of their royal crown and dignity by raising rebellion and discord amongst Their Majesties liege subjects &c. : at the King's Bench Bar at Westminster on Friday the 21st day of November, annoque Dom. 1690.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.

person.persName: England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.
